doc.field: Holds 26 of 67 tapes found in a box labeled "Biz Book." Includes "Shifting Gears: Creating Possibilities for Career Change" by Carole Hyatt, presented by Crain's Business Detroit and Strategies (two copies of the packet, each with two tapes, 1992). Includes a set of 5 tapes re: "Shifting Gears", Warwick Hotel (1990). Other names: WLNA radio "Women's Change" (1997), Jim Cracchiolo (1999), Louise Hay, "The Women's Selling Game: Creating a Buying Atmosphere: Presenting, Probing, Blending" by Hyatt (Transdesigns Conference), Pete/WJM (1984), Warsaw discussion (1990), Budapest group, "How to be on Top of the World" by Yyatt (1991), Hair Thinning (1990). Also various commercial products: "Painless Prospecting" by Denise Roberts (2 copies, 1991), Joseph Mancusi "Why Some People and Organizations Will Never Succeed," "Jampolsky/Howe "Healing Relationships" (1984), Jean Houston "Life: The Art of the Possible" (1983), Stephanie Beling "Success with Weight Control" (1989), Jacquelyn Reinach music tape for UN International Year of the Family (1993), and Tim Wheater music tape (1986).
Series III. Audiotapes >> Subseries III.B. Audiotapes, Not Digitized >> "Biz Book" Tapes (box 2 of 2)
